page.title: 04School age children
page.content: yes, there are quite a few shcool age children living in rowney Green. Their ages range from tiny tot up to 16 and above. They go to school at the age of four or five and leave at the age of 16. There is a small playgroup in Rowney Green at the 'Peace memorial Hall', but it is very small. All the older children have to travel to school either by car or by a specially laid on coach. The schools that they attend are as follows, Bromsgrove, Alvechurch, Deloey Abbey High, solihull and St Augustines Beoley for the 5 and over and the Abbey etc for 9 an over, although some children attend private schools. Although the village is remote and small, but steadily growing, there is plenty accoridng to our survey and the villagers for the children to do eg. disco's.
